# Facility Management Simplified

iLobby's facility and visitor management platform, FacilityOS, powers complex
work environments by optimizing and automating key facility processes to
achieve regulatory **compliance** , enforce **safety** protocols and drive
site **security** requirements.

Request a Demo

Meet the Platform

## Trusted by 1,000+ Enterprises

##

## End-to-End Facility & Visitor Management

FacilityOS™ is a modular platform that powers complex enterprises - such as
manufacturing, industrial and other high-security environments - by optimizing
and digitizing safety, security and compliance protocols.

### Streamlined, Secure Visitor Management

Built specifically for enterprises with mission-critical facilities and
infrastructure, VisitorOS improves workplace safety, security, and compliance
through automation and people-powered support.

Learn More

### Emergency Alerts, Evacuations & Reporting

Be prepared for when the unexpected occurs. EmergencyOS improves the
efficiency and speed of your evacuations and ensures all visitors are
accounted for in the event of an emergency.

Learn More

### Physical Identity & Access Management

Extend the benefits of Access Control to visitor and contractors. SecurityOS
gives you the flexibility to enhance your security measures with ease using
temporary credential management.

Learn More

### Optimized Package Collection & Verification

Track and manage deliveries at a glance, including incoming packages.
DeliveryOS gives you confidence knowing the status and location of every
package and mail item coming into your facility.

Learn More

### Simplified Workforce Management

From capacity management to compliance reporting and everything in between,
WorkforceOS simplifies and streamlines workforce management responsibilities
for increased efficiency and enhanced security.

Learn More

Integrations

### Connect your favorite tools to FacilityOS

Extend the power of the FacilityOS facility and visitor management platform
into the systems you’re already using. Integrate with your most frequently
used business tools, including Slack, Google Hangouts, Salesforce, Gmail, and
a whole lot more.

Learn More

## How We Help Our Clients

Whether your focus is on safety, security, compliance, or a combination of all
three, iLobby's facility and visitor management platform can be tailored to
meet your needs.

  * **Improve Facility Compliance To Industry Standards**

Industry standards and regulations are complex and must be strictly adhered
to. Efficient compliance processes protect a business, its employees and its
reputation. iLobby helps facilities fulfill statutory compliance requirements.

Learn More

  * **Process Contractors and Validate Credentials**

Ease facility compliance with automated sign-in kiosks. Visitor management
compliance software streamlines ID verification and contractor induction
processes. Record and validate credentials, certifications, contracts and
liability.

Learn More

  * **Automate My Reception Experience**

iLobby streamlines and automates visitor sign-ins so you can keep people
flowing smoothly through your facilities. Optimize the check-in process for
contractors and multiple other visitor types without sacrificing thoroughness.

Learn More

  * **Improve and Automate My Facility Evacuation Process**

Effective, resilient evacuation processes rely on strategic organization, a
repeatable Emergency Action Plan and streamlined communication. Ensure
employee and visitor safety and communicate muster point information with a
real-time emergency management system.

Learn More

  * **Manage Facility Security Across Multiple Entry Points**

Managing compliance and security at multiple entry points - whether at one
facility or spread across hundreds of locations around the world - requires a
centralized solution that scales with your organization.

Learn More

  * **High Visitor Traffic, Simplify a Long Check-in Process**

With smart, streamlined pre-registration capabilities, iLobby empowers the
visitor sign-in process with speed and security.

Learn More

  * **Screen Visitors or Restrict Access to My Facilities**

Enhance safety and security for employees, workplaces, organizations, and
data. Powerful workplace management software increases control, even during
off hours, for the most security-conscious facilities.

Learn More

visitor and facility management processes.

Request a Demo

## You're in good company

## I strongly recommend iLobby...

“LG has been using the iLobby product at our HQ facility in Canada to register
all our visitor activity for quite some time now. We found that iLobby has an
excellent quality, very efficient, and very effective product. I strongly
recommend iLobby to any other facility that is seeking to move from a manual
process of registering visitors to an automated process. ”

**Shawn Lee**  
Facility Manager

## ...rollout was completed ahead of schedule...

“Consolidated Container Company (now Altium Packaging) recently rolled out the
iLobby visitor management system to over 60 locations across the US and
Canada. This rollout was completed ahead of schedule and iLobby
representatives kept an open line of communication during this process,
ensuring that the rollout for each site was completed as smoothly as possible.
”

**Avik Purkayastha**  
Project Manager

## I couldn’t recommend this system more.

“iLobby handled all our concerns. The sign in process was VERY quickly adopted
by both our staff and visitors with very minimal training needed. Everything
was so intuitive. Employees are notified when they have a guest, and we
appreciate that we no longer needed to ‘track someone down.’ I couldn’t
recommend this system more. ”

****  
Senior Facilities Manager

## ...the process was excellent.

“It was very collaborative right from the get-go, and the process was
excellent. It was a pleasure to deal with the people that you had on your
team, the results were what we expected and there's the capability of
continuing improvement, and always good support. ”

**Jeff Thorn**  
Manager, Security Operational Support
